findings.title: Burn from any account
findings.description: Owner can burn tokens from any account in Martis token contract and Space Martis token contract.
findings.location: Martis token contract (0xdd655D9c3865151BCAfb66A2A5442c9329852184) and Space Martis token contract (0x7d685794135572Fb2eF00baDC1A024Eee7dEA726)

findings.title: No delegates move
findings.description: There are no delegates move in Space Martis token contract after burn and mint, but the contractâ€™s logic is the same with goose contracts.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Minters can mint until max supply; Owner can add/remove minters in Martis token contract and Space Martis token contract.
findings.location: Martis token contract (0xdd655D9c3865151BCAfb66A2A5442c9329852184) and Space Martis token contract (0x7d685794135572Fb2eF00baDC1A024Eee7dEA726)
